alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 11:26PM AKST until January 29 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches for a total snow accumulation of 12 to 24 inches for Whittier and Turnagain Pass. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches south of Summit Lake to Seward. * WHERE...Western Prince William Sound, Turnagain Pass. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates should exceed 1 inch per hour at times, resulting in periods of poor visibility. The heavier snow accumulation will be from near Turnagain Pass and areas north. Snow accumulation will be less south of Summit Lake to Seward, but times of high snow rates will still result in poor visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
